patthana15.18:1.1_0: Hetu atīto dhammo nahetussa naatītassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana15.18:1.1_1: Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava …pe… upanissaye nava …pe… vigate nava.
patthana15.18:2.1_0: Hetu anāgato dhammo nahetussa naanāgatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
